alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 25 at 3:52AM MDT until April 25 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...the western Mosquito Range, Lake County, the eastern Sawatch Mountain Range, Chaffee County, the northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, the Wet Mountains and Teller County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
